prompts: Create a small fire-type Pokemon with a blue belly and bright orange flames on its back.
I want a cute fire Pokemon that has a yellow body and is perfect for beginners.
Generate a Pokemon design featuring a body shape that's compact and fiery with vibrant colors.
Make a playful fire-type creature that has a unique flame color and a round shape.
Imagine a Pokemon that can evolve into a larger fire creature, starting with a tiny, adorable form.
Design a Pokemon with a gentle personality and a vibrant flame, ideal for forest habitats.
Give me a fiery Pokemon with a small stature, featuring bright orange and yellow accents.
